currentDisputedAgenda.name: Committee Formation
currentDisputedAgenda.description: The elected player gains this card. Before players vote on an agenda that requires a player to be elected, the owner of this card may discard this card to choose a player to be elected. Players do not vote on that agenda.

currentAgendas.name: Anti-Intellectual Revolution (Against)
currentAgendas.effect: At the start of the next strategy phase, each player chooses and exhausts 1 planet for each technology they own.

currentAgendas.name: Demilitarized Zone
currentAgendas.effect: Attach this card to the elected planet's card. Then, destroy all units on that planet. Player's units cannot land, be produced, or be placed on this planet.
